fixturesAndFittings.title: Fixtures and Fittings
fixturesAndFittings.description: This is so a buyerâ€™s offer can take into account whether you are taking something of value or leaving extra items.  A full list will need to be completed after the sale is agreed.

kitchen.title: Kitchen
kitchen.description: Note: In this section please also indicate whether the item is fitted or freestanding.

lightFittings.title: Light fittings
lightFittings.description: Note: If the seller removes a light fitting, it is assumed that the seller will replace the fitting with a ceiling rose, a flex, bulb holder and bulb and that they will be left in a safe condition.

fittedUnits.title: Fitted units
fittedUnits.description: Note: Fitted units include, for example, fitted cupboards, fitted shelves, and fitted wardrobes
